devdoc.author: Richard Meissner - @rmeissner

getMessageHash(bytes).details: Returns hash of a message that can be signed by owners.

signMessage(bytes).details: Can be verified using EIP-1271 validation method by passing the pre-image of the message hash and empty bytes as the signature.

params._data: Arbitrary length data that should be marked as signed on the behalf of address(this).

devdoc.title: SignMessageLib - Allows to sign messages on-chain by writing the signed message hashes on-chain.
